sentences.sCn: 在每个肩部的功能肩章。

sentences.sContent: Lens:Li3 Bing Bing the Jing, epaulet, handcuffs all together, with really about.

sentences.sCn: 镜头：李冰冰警服、肩章、手铐都齐了，和真的差不多。

sentences.sContent: Service Medal yen sold off a bag, apprenticeship, and 11-piece set epaulet.
sentences.sContent_eng: Service Medal yen sold off a bag, apprenticeship, and 11-piece set epaulet.
sentences.sCn: 服务奖章日元抛售一包，学徒，以及11件套肩章。

trans.tranOther: Epaulets are decorations worn on the shoulders of certain uniforms, especially military ones
